Make A Resolution To Complete
Your Profile This Year

2019 is here, so you should make sure your profile is complete and up- to- date. Here are some tips for completing your profile.

Professional Profile Photo

Use a professional headshot for your profile to maximize your conversion rates.

Biography

Your biography should highlight any skills or experiences that set you apart from others.

Professional Experience

Lawyers with more experience, particularly relevant work experience, tend to instill greater confidence and trust.

Participate in Ask a Lawyer

Answering questions in Justia’s Ask a Lawyer is a great way to showcase your legal knowledge and professionalism for a first great impression.

Justia Lawyer Rating

Consumers are more likely to contact and retain a lawyer with a high Justia rating. Ask other lawyers familiar with your work to write a review.
Complete Your Profile Now
